backgrounds.name: Archæologist
backgrounds.description: You study Syrneth ruins and explore the lost parts of Terra.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you turn an artifact of value over to a university, museum, or a publicly displayed site

backgrounds.name: Aristocrat
backgrounds.description: You were born into the nobility of your home country and regularly attend the courts.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you prove there is more to nobility than expensive clothes and attending court

backgrounds.name: Army Officer
backgrounds.description: You enlisted in the army and soon found yourself in a command position.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you seize command during a moment of intense violence or extreme danger.

backgrounds.name: Artist
backgrounds.description: You work tirelessly to create objects of beauty.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you make a sacrifice in the hope of making Théah a more beautiful place.

backgrounds.name: Assassin
backgrounds.description: You stalked the shadows as a specter of silent death in return for bloody coin, but no more.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you go out of your way to avoid the death of an adversary or outright refuse a course of action because it could result in another person's death.

backgrounds.name: Cavalry
backgrounds.description: You are a mounted warrior and part of your Nation's esteemed cavalry.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you apply your skills in horse riding to an uncommon situation.

backgrounds.name: Courtier
backgrounds.description: You regularly attend the courts of your home Nation and act as a diplomat to foreign courts.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you turn the tide of violence with charm and flair.

backgrounds.name: Crafter
backgrounds.description: You work tirelessly to create objects of function.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use everyday crafting skills to solve a problem deemed too complex for such a simple solution.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: You break unjust laws to achieve what you believe is the greater good.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you break the law in the pursuit of a noble endeavor.

backgrounds.name: Doctor
backgrounds.description: You work to heal the sick and tend to the wounded.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you tend to the injuries of a Villain or the innocents harmed by a Villain.

backgrounds.name: Duelist
backgrounds.description: You have devoted your life to mastering the blade.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you resort to the edge of your blade to defend a noble ideal.

backgrounds.name: Engineer
backgrounds.description: You are concerned with applying scientific knowledge, mathematics, and ingenuity to develop solutions for technical, social and commercial problems
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your technological savvy to solve a problem.

backgrounds.name: Explorer
backgrounds.description: You live to see the farthest reaches that Terra has to offer.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you set your eyes upon a sight few, if any, Théans have ever seen before.

backgrounds.name: Farmkid
backgrounds.description: You were raised on a small farm, working to survive, and have never known the life of adventure.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a complex problem in a simple, tried and true method from back on the farm.

backgrounds.name: Hunter
backgrounds.description: You sleep under the stars and hunt your meals with your own two hands.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your hunter's acumen to save someone from danger.

backgrounds.name: Jenny
backgrounds.description: You seduce others for fun and profit.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you resolve a conflict with seduction or sexual wiles.

backgrounds.name: Mercenary
backgrounds.description: You sell your skills in battle to the highest bidder.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to ply your trade for a reason that's worth more to you than money.

backgrounds.name: Merchant
backgrounds.description: You travel the countryside to sell your wares in market or port.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you sell an item for far less than it's worth to someone who desperately needs it.

backgrounds.name: Naval Officer
backgrounds.description: You enlisted in the navy and worked your way into the command crew of a ship.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put the needs of the crew ahead of the needs of the mission.

backgrounds.name: Orphan
backgrounds.description: You lost your parents at a young age and have been forced to look out for yourself.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put yourself in danger to ensure someone else doesn't have to be alone.

backgrounds.name: Performer
backgrounds.description: You work tirelessly to create an experience of beauty.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your crowd-pleasing skills for something more than making a few coins.

backgrounds.name: Pirate
backgrounds.description: You sail the seas, taking what you need, and providing true freedom to all who accept the call.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you make a personal sacrifice to ensure the freedom of another.

backgrounds.name: Priest
backgrounds.description: You serve a higher cause with every living breath you take.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you set aside the rhetoric and take action to practice the virtues you preach.

backgrounds.name: Professor
backgrounds.description: You teach others at a prestigious learning institution.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use knowledge from an obscure text to solve a complicated problem.

backgrounds.name: Pugilist
backgrounds.description: You rely on your hands and feet to solve all the violent problems in your life.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you drop what you're holding to fight with fists regardless of your opponent's weapon.

backgrounds.name: Quartermaster
backgrounds.description: You serve aboard a ship taking care of all the things the other sailors ignore.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a problem for your crew.

backgrounds.name: Sailor
backgrounds.description: You serve no country or master, but the ship and your crew are all the family you need.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put aside your personal desires to ensure the safety and comfort of your allies.

backgrounds.name: Scholar
backgrounds.description: You dedicate yourself to learning and documenting all the wonders of Terra.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put yourself in harm's way in pursuit of knowledge.

backgrounds.name: Servant
backgrounds.description: You work for another doing whatever your master's bidding may be.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put yourself in danger to assist another character with a difficult task.

backgrounds.name: Ship Captain
backgrounds.description: You command a crew and sail the seas for whatever banner you fly.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you're the last one in your crew to safety.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: You know how to fight—and how to kill—and you have made a life doing so under banners and for lords.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you stick to the plan regardless of the danger to yourself.

backgrounds.name: Spy
backgrounds.description: You serve your Nation by infiltrating its enemies and securing their secrets.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you take a great risk to uncover a secret.

backgrounds.name: Bard
backgrounds.description: You tell the old tales, the stories of Legends, and ensure the soul of Avalon is never forgotten.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a problem by following an example set by a Legend.

backgrounds.name: Knight Errant
backgrounds.description: You are imbued with the legendary magic of the Knights of King Elilodd.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you uphold an ideal of knightly virtue in a way that gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Privateer
backgrounds.description: You have been given a charter to sink any ships that are enemies to the Crown of Avalon.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you defeat the enemies of the Crown of Avalon.

backgrounds.name: Unification Agent
backgrounds.description: You have been tasked by the Crown of Avalon to keep the peace among the Isles.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you ensure the stability of the Glamour Isles Unification.

backgrounds.name: Puritan
backgrounds.description: You are a reformed Objectionist who seeks to "purify" the Church of Avalon from all Vaticine practices
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you expose corruption, hypocrisy, or ineffectiveness within the Vaticine Church.

backgrounds.name: Saoi (Wise One)
backgrounds.description: You hold the highest honor bestowed by Aosdána, a state-supported association of Inish creative artists.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put yourself in harm's way to protect the artists of Théah.

backgrounds.name: Seanchaidh (Warrior-Poet)
backgrounds.description: You are a storyteller and historian, versed in the laws of your people and their ancient ways.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you enforce the ancient laws of your people.

backgrounds.name: Alquimista
backgrounds.description: You sought long and hard until you unlocked the mystery of alchemical creation.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you improve another Théan's life through Alchemy.

backgrounds.name: Antropólogo
backgrounds.description: You are a cousin to the Archæologist but focused on the people you find and not the ruins they left behind.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a problem for a group of strangers.

backgrounds.name: Diestro
backgrounds.description: You have dedicated your life to the understanding of the Sword, not just its function.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you best a trained duelist at her own game.

backgrounds.name: Mirabilist (Priest)
backgrounds.description: You are a master scholar of the Vaticine Church and member of the Ordo Doctorem Mirabilis.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you give of yourself to demonstrate the warmth and compassion of the Vaticine Church.

backgrounds.name: Hexe
backgrounds.description: You are a master of Hexenwerk, the sorcery of the dead.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you go out of your way to ensure that the dead stay dead.

backgrounds.name: Krieger (Warrior)
backgrounds.description: You survived the War of the Cross and carry the scars of many battles on your flesh.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to fight to defend the defenseless or prevent destruction.

backgrounds.name: Ungetümjäger (Monster Hunter)
backgrounds.description: You know that there are unnatural creatures stalking your homeland, and you've sworn to destroy them.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to hunt down an inhuman creature so it will never hurt anyone ever again.

backgrounds.name: Vitalienbruder (Pirate)
backgrounds.description: You are one of the many brothers of Eisen dedicated to fair trade and equal shares.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you take from the rich to give to the poor.

backgrounds.name: L'Ami du Roi (Courtier)
backgrounds.description: You are, literally, a favorite courtier of the King of Montaigne.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you leverage the King's favor to solve a problem.

backgrounds.name: Mousquetaire
backgrounds.description: You are sworn to protect the King of Montaigne and your fellow musketeers until your death.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you take a serious injury to protect your comrades or King.

backgrounds.name: Révolutionnaire
backgrounds.description: You have pledged yourself to seeing your country freed from the tyranny of the aristocracy.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you make a personal sacrifice for the sake of liberty.

backgrounds.name: Sorcier Porté
backgrounds.description: You have mastered the art of Porté, the magical opening of doorways.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you close a [i]Blessure[/i] that a Villain ripped open.

backgrounds.name: Poseł (Envoy)
backgrounds.description: You act as an advisor to the entire voting body of the Commonwealth.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you insist on democracy when it would be advantageous for you to not take a vote.

backgrounds.name: Tremtis (Expatriate)
backgrounds.description: You fled to the Commonwealth seeking asylum after Golden Liberty was declared.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when something from your past comes back to haunt you.

backgrounds.name: Winged Hussar
backgrounds.description: You serve in the proudest of cavalry regiments, an elite unit in the Sarmatian military.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you and your steed plunge head-first into a battle or conflict, heedless of the danger.

backgrounds.name: Žynys (Soothsayer)
backgrounds.description: You met the Devil on the road, tricked him, and gained his powers at your command.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use something evil for good.

backgrounds.name: Cossack
backgrounds.description: You live in the Eastern steppes of Ussura, a place with a proud heritage of horsemanship and warfare.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you leave behind something important so you can travel light.

backgrounds.name: Progressivist
backgrounds.description: You travel Théah to bring innovations home to modernize the old country.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you risk life and limb to secure a piece of advanced technology.

backgrounds.name: Touched by Matushka
backgrounds.description: You have been touched by Matushka and granted great power at a terrible price.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you teach someone a lesson in a way that would make Matushka proud.

backgrounds.name: Whaler
backgrounds.description: You sail the frozen seas of Ussura with spears and boats tracking the most dangerous sea life.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you face a creature that could swallow a man whole.

backgrounds.name: Bearsark
backgrounds.description: You fight with a nearly uncontrollable, trance-like fury.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you let the Game Master choose your character's next action.

backgrounds.name: Guildmästaren
backgrounds.description: You serve on the Vendel League and manage Guilds in some capacity.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use the vast resources of the Vendel League for something more noble than profit.

backgrounds.name: Sjørøver (Pirate)
backgrounds.description: You give honor to the ancient Vestenmennavenjar heritage of naval combat, raiding, and pillaging.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when put yourself in danger in order to ensure your place of honor at the Allfather’s table.

backgrounds.name: Skald
backgrounds.description: You interpret the mysteries of the bonfire and the bones, sharing tales of glory and defeat.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your knowledge as a Seidr to help another Hero to solve a problem or thwart a Villain.

backgrounds.name: Bravo
backgrounds.description: You have sworn to protect someone else and will always be at his side.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you put yourself in danger to defend the life of the person you’ve sworn to protect.

backgrounds.name: Consigliere
backgrounds.description: You work as an “advisor” to a Merchant Prince.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you take a great risk to protect someone else’s secret.

backgrounds.name: Esploratore
backgrounds.description: You travel the world on behalf of a Merchant Prince.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use non-Théan items or knowledge to solve a problem.

backgrounds.name: Sorte Strega
backgrounds.description: You can sense the strands of Fate, twisting and controlling them to your will... but not without a price.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you commit to a dangerous course of action that you believe is destiny.

backgrounds.name: Sidhe Squire
backgrounds.description: The Sidhe have returned to Avalon, and it falls to you to make certain their return is as peaceful as it can be.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you go out of your way to bridge the gap between Sidhe and mortal, leading to under- standing between the two peoples.

backgrounds.name: Royal Conservationist
backgrounds.description: Avalon is a beautiful land, and the Queen has entrusted you to ensure it stays that way.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you seek to preserve a natural wonder and doing so gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Shannagary Runner
backgrounds.description: A skilled sailor can safely guide his ship down the Shannagary in three days. You can do it in two, with a few scratches.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you sacrifice safety for speed and doing so gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Dornálaí
backgrounds.description: "Oi, yerrabig fella. I betchaboxa bit, don'tcha?"
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you let bygones be bygones after a fight, win or lose, and form a bond with your opponent.

backgrounds.name: Boticario
backgrounds.description: Science is a beautiful thing.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you doggedly pursue an alchemical secret, and your persistence gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: La Joven Promesa
backgrounds.description: You did not win the tournament at el Baile, but you were recognized as someone to be watched.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you complicate a problem to improve your skills with a sword or expand your reputation.

backgrounds.name: Sabueso Real
backgrounds.description: The enemies of the Royal Detectives insist you're just another of the king's hunting hounds, but they all say it from prison.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you refuse to act until you have more information, causing even more trouble for you.

backgrounds.name: Tercio
backgrounds.description: You signed up to serve to make a better lot for yourself. That all fell through, but you have not given up hope.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you take up a cause in pursuit of redemption, a pardon for past crimes or a chance at earning a noble title.

backgrounds.name: Balayeur
backgrounds.description: You are a street sweeper by trade, and you bring your own broom that spits metal and eats black powder.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you successfully maintain control of a chaotic situation while you are outnumbered.

backgrounds.name: Épée Sanglante
backgrounds.description: You learned the art of blade and blood, earning the title of Épée Sanglante along with your peers' admiration and fear.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your opponent’s fear of your ability to avoid a conflict, whether his assumptions about you are correct or not.

backgrounds.name: La Souris du Marché
backgrounds.description: You know these streets like the back of your hand.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to share your ill-gotten gains with someone else, because she needs it more than you do.

backgrounds.name: La Voix des Sans-Voix
backgrounds.description: You speak for those who cannot speak for themselves, too weak or too afraid. You are the voice of the voiceless.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when declining a solution that benefits you personally, but is detrimental for those you represent.

backgrounds.name: Walkway Escapee
backgrounds.description: You were once trapped in the walkway for an untold span, but you escaped—not that you remember it. In fact, you do not remember your life before that either... yet.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point whenever your past comes back to haunt you, and it causes you problems.

backgrounds.name: Hrungnir
backgrounds.description: You do not need a sword to be dangerous.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when someone underestimates you due to your lack of a weapon, and you turn his misconception to your advantage.
advantages: Anything Can Be a Weapon If You Hold It Right

backgrounds.name: Murskaaja
backgrounds.description: A line of defenders is only as strong as the weakest link. You excel at finding that link and shattering it.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you hurl yourself headlong into a dangerous situation in order to throw your opponents off-guard.

backgrounds.name: Pankkiiri
backgrounds.description: Money talks, and you have quite the vocabulary.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your position or money to bully another character into a course of action, and it gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Vala
backgrounds.description: The scribes and politicians of today believe words have power. They have no idea how right they are.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you refuse to solve a problem using magic when it would be easy to do so; the problem is not important enough to wield such power against it.

backgrounds.name: Apostat
backgrounds.description: You were cast out from your homeland because of what you could do, but you won’t let that stop you from doing what’s right.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you chose to ally with someone you find personally distasteful in order to accomplish something important.

backgrounds.name: Befleckte Seele
backgrounds.description: There’s something inside of you that’s dark and wicked, always gnawing at the edge of your mind. But power—even when it stems from evil—can be turned to good.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you use your Monstrous nature to solve a problem and someone shuns you for it.

backgrounds.name: Eisenblut
backgrounds.description: There is still nobility in Eisen, and there is still iron in your blood.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to sacrifice something important to you personally for the good of Eisen or its people.

backgrounds.name: Stratege
backgrounds.description: You were always excellent at chess when you were a child. Now you understand that the world itself is a chessboard, and you’re still the best in the game.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you make a critical miscalculation in your plan, and it gets you or your allies into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Macher
backgrounds.description: Get in, get what you’re after and get out. But you make sure that EVERYONE gets out.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to reveal yourself to an enemy in order to help another character get out of trouble.

backgrounds.name: Mówca
backgrounds.description: There’s a good soul inside of everyone. Some people just need a little help in finding it.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you successfully solve a problem by convincing another character to listen to her conscience.

backgrounds.name: Rycerz Ludzi
backgrounds.description: You are a knight of the people, defending the common citizen from any threat he might face.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a problem by convincing a group of people to unite and stand up for themselves.

backgrounds.name: Rycerz Senatu
backgrounds.description: You carry the word of the Senat. You are empowered to enact their will and answer only to them.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to hide something from an authority figure for noble reasons, and it gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Borets
backgrounds.description: You’ve made a name for yourself as an exceptional Ussuran brawler.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when someone recognizes you due to your reputation, and you'd really prefer they didn't.

backgrounds.name: Doverchivii Dusha
backgrounds.description: You’re a sucker for a good sob story, but you’d rather trust the wrong person than turn away from someone who truly needs you.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when another character gets away with lying to you or manipulating you, and it gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Razrushitel
backgrounds.description: Why go around when you can go through?
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you commit to a course of action that is loud, direct and lacks any sense of subtlety.

backgrounds.name: Tură’s Cursed
backgrounds.description: There is more than one path to power. You know this first hand.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you convince another character to shun authority or act outside of their defined social status, and it gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Capitano
backgrounds.description: With a ship under your feet, the wind at your back and a crew singing shanties, there’s nothing you can’t do.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you commit to a dangerous course of action because your bravado and ego won't let you turn away.

backgrounds.name: Moroso
backgrounds.description: What’s the point of romance if it doesn’t come with a little—or a lot—of danger?
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to let another character get away with something because you're romantically interested in him, and it gets you into trouble.

backgrounds.name: Pistola Nascosta
backgrounds.description: By the time they see the barrel of your pistol, it’s already too late. You hope it doesn’t come to that.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you solve a problem with the threat of violence, but without having drawn your firearm.

backgrounds.name: Wild Strega
backgrounds.description: Your magic is unrefined, but no less potent and no less dangerous.
backgrounds.quirk: Earn a Hero Point when you choose to help another character using your untrained Sorte powers, and it gets you into trouble.
